summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bitcoin Crypto App. All backend APIs (9/9) and frontend features working perfectly. App successfully displays live Bitcoin price, interactive charts, top cryptocurrencies table, trending coins, and global market stats with dark theme and neon styling.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about chart width/height dimensions
design_issues.impact: No visual impact - charts display correctly

passed_tests: Bitcoin price API with all required fields
Bitcoin historical data for all timeframes (1D, 7D, 30D, 90D)
Trending coins API returning 7 trending coins
Global market stats API with market cap, volume, dominance
Bitcoin Hero card displays price and chart
Global stats card with market data
Dark theme with neon cyan/green accents
